thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Melanie Wyles

author: Melanie Wyles
title: Melanie Wyles
text: I can thoroughly recommend TrustedHousesitters. I have been travelling around the UK to see more of the countryside. Every place I have been has lived up to expectations. The site makes it easy for you to link with people looking for sitters and the team at TrustedHousesitters respond quickly and effectively to any queries. I have made friends both Human, Feline and Canine. Thank you TrustedHousesitters. Keep up the good work.
